attributes.action: lower the age of smear tests
attributes.additional_details: I found out I had cervical cancer at the age of 24, I had a smear test done at 23 only because I had very high signs of cancer, I think smears should be lowered as some people out there don't have children and are getting told they have to have a hysterectomy because they have cervical cancer!! This stops peoples chances and even takes there lifes when it can be saved
